description.en: Merge data points with the attributes of the study region the points fall into (R function 'points_att_polygon').

input_data.title: Table to be merged with study region
input_data.description: URL to the input table containing the in-situ data points with coordinates. Can be provided as Excel file or CSV file (comma-separated text file). The coordinates have to be in WGS84 coordinate system.

regions.title: Study region or study subregions
regions.description: URL to the study region, or several regions, to classify your input data into groups of interest. Currently it has to be provided as a shapefile. It can be in any coordinate system and will be transformed to WGS84 during this process.

colname_long.title: Column name for longitude
colname_long.description: Name of the column that contains longitude values (in WGS84).

colname_lat.title: Column name for latiitude
colname_lat.description: Name of the column that contains latitude values (in WGS84).

data_merged_with_regions.title: The input table grouped and enhanced by study region
data_merged_with_regions.description: The input data table, with added study region name and study region attributes.
